mapper.insert: begin INSERT INTO bim_base.city (name, first_letter, pinyin) SELECT name, first_letter, pinyin FROM bim_grab.city_maoyan b WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM bim_base.city a WHERE a.name != b.name); INSERT INTO bim_base.city (name, first_letter, pinyin) SELECT name, first_letter, pinyin FROM bim_grab.city_mtime b WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM bim_base.city a WHERE a.name != b.name);
